span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 的 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委托是 为类的事件定义的。 The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 可以通过在 ASP.NET 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中指定名为**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**的子例程来访问类的事件。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 事件在事件期间引发。The event is raised during the event. 使用当前 构造对象并将其传递给AnonymousIdentification_Creating事件。The constructs an object using the current and passes it to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event. 可以使用提供给 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件的对象的属性, 将匿名标识符设置为自定义值。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value. 如果未在 **AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件期间为属性指定值, 则使用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event, a is used. 仅当匿名身份验证通过将配置元素设置为`true`时, 才会引发 AnonymousIdentification_Creating 事件。The **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event is only raised when anonymous identification is by setting the configuration element to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用**AnonymousIdentification_Creating**事件将匿名标识符设置为自定义值。The following code example uses the **AnonymousIdentification_Creating** event to set the anonymous identifier to a custom value.
